question.body: Which disease can be minimized by frequently changing the position of a patient’s body?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Burns are prevented by avoiding excessive heat, radiation, electricity and chemical exposure.
Incorrect. Psoriasis occurs when a person’s body produces too many cells.
Incorrect. Acne results from plugged sebaceous glands.
Correct. Bedsores can be minimized by frequent repositioning of the body.
